shapes.description: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes.

property.name: Unit Code
property.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.

property.name: Unit Text
property.description: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.

property.name: Value
property.description: The value of the quantitative value or property value node.
